caseStudies.title: Luxeliv
caseStudies.description: is an online luxury lifestyle and fashion brand

overview.description: Our client was heavily dependent on Amazon and Meesho for sales. While marketplace visibility brought orders, high RTO rates, low margins, and uncontrollable ad costs were eating into profitability. Their own website had traffic but almost negligible conversions, making them believe that website sales don’t work for their  category.                                                                            Our team partnered with the brand to transform their underperforming website into a profit-generating sales channel,reducing dependency on marketplaces and keeping margins in their own hands.

challenges.title: Challenges Before Partnering With Us

painPoints.impact: Reduced margins due to commissions and discounts
Losses on every return / COD failure
Ad spend was high, but ROI was near zero
People browsed but finalized orders on marketplaces

challenges.summary: The brand wasn't struggling with demand — they were struggling with conversion, trust, and profitability.

servicesDelivered.title: Services we delivered
description: Developed a modern and user-friendly website
Implemented e-commerce functionality
Applied SEO best practices for better search visibility
Created a cohesive brand strategy
Built trust through consistent design and messaging
Improved overall user engagement and conversions

result.title: Results Achieved
result.subtitle: In a span of 30 days, the impact was visible — and scalable.
result.description: The new digital platform successfully elevated Luxeliv's brand presence, resulting in increased online visibility, improved customer engagement, and a significant boost in online sales. The website effectively showcases their premium kitchenware collection while maintaining the warmth of their family-owned business values.
summary: From "no sales on website" → to becoming a primary sales channel
From losing margins on RTO & platform fees → to profitable direct orders

caseStudies.title: Dhirsons Jewellery House
caseStudies.description: The Premium Diamond Jewellery Wholesale store in Karol Bagh, Delhi & Retail Store

overview.description: Dhirsons Jewellery House is a premium diamond jewellery destination in Delhi's prestigious Karol Bagh area. We crafted a luxurious digital experience that mirrors their exceptional craftsmanship.

challenges: Showcasing high-end jewellery in a digital format
Building trust for online luxury purchases
Competing in the premium jewellery market online
Creating an elegant user experience that matches the brand

servicesDelivered.title: Services we delivered
description: Designed an elegant and sophisticated website
Showcased premium diamond collections with high-quality imagery
Provided detailed product information for better buyer confidence
Implemented advanced search and filtering functionality
Integrated a secure and reliable checkout system
Applied comprehensive SEO optimization to attract high-value customers

result.description: The digital transformation positioned Dhirsons as a leading online destination for premium diamond jewellery. The website successfully conveys luxury and trust, resulting in increased inquiries from both wholesale and retail customers.

caseStudies.title: Oh My Pet Grooming
caseStudies.description: At Oh My Pet Grooming, we bring professional pet care services right to your door

overview.description: Oh My Pet Grooming is a mobile pet grooming service bringing professional care directly to pet owners' doorsteps. We developed a user-friendly platform that makes booking convenient and stress-free.

challenges: Creating an intuitive online booking system
Building trust with pet owners for a mobile service
Optimizing for local search results
Showcasing services and pricing clearly

servicesDelivered.title: Services we delivered
description: Built a welcoming and easy-to-navigate website
Integrated an online booking system for effortless appointment scheduling
Added clear service descriptions for better understanding
Ensured pricing transparency to build customer trust
Optimized the website for local SEO to reach nearby customers

result.description: The new website streamlined the booking process and significantly increased customer acquisition. Pet owners can now easily schedule services, view available time slots, and learn about grooming options, leading to higher conversion rates and customer satisfaction.

caseStudies.title: Executive Cars
caseStudies.description: Welcome to our first-class chauffeur car service in Melbourne, the best choice

overview.description: Executive Cars offers premium chauffeur services in Melbourne, providing luxury transportation for corporate and private clients. We created a sophisticated digital platform that reflects their high-end service standards.

challenges: Conveying luxury and professionalism online
Competing in the premium transportation market
Implementing effective booking and inquiry systems
Targeting corporate and high-value individual clients

servicesDelivered.title: Services we delivered
description: Developed a premium website with elegant design and smooth functionality
Showcased fleet details and service offerings clearly
Integrated online booking functionality
Enabled corporate account management features
Executed targeted advertising campaigns
Focused outreach on Melbourne’s business community

result.description: The digital transformation established Executive Cars as Melbourne's premier chauffeur service online. The combination of an elegant website, strategic SEO, and targeted advertising resulted in significant growth in both corporate contracts and individual bookings.

caseStudies.title: Silvago
caseStudies.description: Minimal silver jewellery brand delivering elegance with simplicity

overview.description: Silvago is a contemporary silver jewellery brand focusing on minimalist designs that celebrate simplicity and elegance. We crafted a digital experience that embodies their modern aesthetic.

challenges: Standing out in the competitive jewellery market
Attracting minimalist design enthusiasts
Creating a seamless e-commerce experience
Building brand awareness from scratch

servicesDelivered.title: Services we delivered
description: Designed and developed a clean, minimalist e-commerce website
Showcased Silvago’s jewellery collection effectively
Implemented intuitive and user-friendly navigation
Used high-quality product photography for better presentation
Integrated secure and seamless payment solutions
Supported the platform with targeted advertising campaigns

result.description: The launch successfully positioned Silvago as a go-to destination for minimalist silver jewellery. The clean design and strategic marketing attracted a dedicated customer base, resulting in strong sales growth and brand recognition.

caseStudies.title: Prozvofit
caseStudies.description: Gym equipment manufacturer delivering strength-focused solutions

overview.description: Prozvofit manufactures professional-grade gym equipment designed for strength training and fitness facilities. We built a powerful digital platform to showcase their industrial-strength product line.

challenges: Showcasing heavy equipment effectively online
Reaching gym owners and fitness facilities
Competing with established equipment brands
Demonstrating product quality and durability

servicesDelivered.title: Services we delivered
description: Developed a comprehensive B2B-focused platform
Displayed detailed product specifications clearly
Showcased high-quality product imagery
Provided technical documentation for informed decision-making
Integrated quote request functionality
Included distributor and partner information
Executed strategic advertising to reach gym owners and fitness entrepreneurs

result.description: The digital platform successfully established Prozvofit as a serious competitor in the gym equipment market. The website effectively communicates product quality and attracted inquiries from fitness facilities, leading to substantial business growth.

caseStudies.title: Crossroads Hospital
caseStudies.description: Healthcare website with patient-focused digital experience

overview.description: Crossroads Hospital is a modern healthcare facility committed to patient-centered care. We created a comprehensive digital platform that makes healthcare information accessible and appointment booking effortless.

challenges: Creating a user-friendly experience for all age groups
Ensuring HIPAA compliance and data security
Integrating appointment booking systems
Making medical information easily accessible

servicesDelivered.title: Services we delivered
description: Developed a comprehensive healthcare website
Enabled online appointment booking functionality
Provided clear and accessible medical services information
Ensured full responsiveness across all devices
Optimized the website for search engines to improve discoverability

result.description: The new digital platform transformed patient engagement and streamlined hospital operations. Patients can now easily book appointments, access their records, and find information about services, resulting in improved patient satisfaction and operational efficiency.

caseStudies.title: Godrej
caseStudies.description: Performance marketing for a premium residential project in South Delhi

overview.description: Godrej South Estate is a premium residential project offering luxury 2.5, 3 & 4 BHK homes in South Delhi. We executed a focused, project-level digital strategy to generate qualified enquiries and support the on-ground sales team through performance-driven campaigns.

challenges: Targeting high-intent luxury home buyers in a competitive South Delhi market
Reducing low-quality and irrelevant enquiries
Maintaining efficient CPLs in a premium real estate segment
Aligning ad messaging with real sales conversations

servicesDelivered.title: Services we delivered
description: Executed Meta and Google Ads campaigns
Used location-focused premium messaging
Applied audience filtering to reduce low-intent enquiries
Continuously optimised campaigns for better performance
Aligned campaigns with landing pages
Refined messaging based on sales team feedback
Improved overall lead quality and site visit intent

result.description: The performance-driven approach delivered consistent enquiry volumes while improving lead quality and sales efficiency. Ongoing optimisation helped balance scale with relevance in a premium market.
metrics: Mid to high hundreds of leads during active campaign phases
Improved lead quality after creative and audience optimisation
Better sales conversation quality with fewer irrelevant enquiries

caseStudies.title: M3M Panipat
caseStudies.description: Performance marketing for a Tier-2 real estate project

overview.description: M3M City of Dreams is a residential development in Sector 36, Panipat. We executed a project-level digital strategy focused on generating consistent local and investor enquiries through clarity-led messaging and performance-driven campaigns tailored for a Tier-2 market.

challenges: Driving consistent enquiries in a Tier-2 real estate market
Balancing investor and end-user messaging
Filtering serious buyers from low-intent leads
Improving lead-to-call conversion speed

servicesDelivered.title: Services we delivered
description: Localized Meta and Google Ads creatives
Audience targeting for Panipat and surrounding regions
Price-band visibility shown upfront to improve lead intent
Campaigns optimized for call-driven enquiries
Funnel optimisation based on lead behaviour
Sales follow-up creatives to support conversions

result.description: The structured performance approach delivered steady enquiry flow and faster conversions. Clear pricing cues and location-focused communication helped improve investor interest and sales velocity.
metrics: Consistent lead flow during campaign periods
Faster lead-to-call connect compared to NCR markets
Higher investor interest driven by transparent pricing cues

caseStudies.title: SBP – Derabassi, Mohali
caseStudies.description: Project-level performance marketing for a regional real estate market focused on steady enquiries and site visit intent

overview.description: SBP is a mid-segment residential development in Derabassi, Mohali, serving buyers across the Tricity belt. We executed a project-level marketing and performance strategy focused on generating consistent enquiries and improving site visit intent through clarity-led communication and targeted campaigns.

challenges: Generating steady enquiries in a regional real estate market
Filtering non-serious and low-intent enquiries
Maintaining stable CPLs over time
Improving lead quality for better sales connect rates

servicesDelivered.title: Services we delivered
description: Executed Meta and Google Ads campaigns
Used location and price-led communication
Applied high-intent audience targeting across local and nearby cities
Optimised campaigns continuously to improve CPL stability
Created sales support creatives for follow-ups
Refined messaging to reduce non-serious enquiries

result.description: The performance-focused approach delivered consistent enquiry flow with improved lead quality. Clear, simple messaging and faster optimisation cycles helped sales teams achieve better connect rates and reduced low-intent calls.
metrics: Steady monthly enquiry flow during active phases
Improved lead quality after messaging refinement
Fewer low-intent calls and better sales connect rates
